original_text: And Crispus, the chief ruler of the synagogue, believed on the Lord with all his house; and many of the Corinthians hearing believed, and were baptized.
korean_text: 또 회당장 그리스보가 온 집안과 더불어 주를 믿으며 수많은 고린도 사람도 듣고 믿어 세례를 받더라

sentences.original_text: And Crispus, the chief ruler of the synagogue,
believed on the Lord with all his house;
sentences.korean_translation: 주를 믿었고 그 온 집안도 함께 믿었으며

sentences.original_text: and many of the Corinthians hearing believed,
